mapper.insert:
insert into cms_room_order
ROOM_ORDER_ID,
USER_ID,
USER_NAME,
USER_TEL,
TUSER_ID,
ORDER_NO,
VENUE_ID,
ROOM_ID,
BOOK_STATUS,
BOOK_ID,
VALID_CODE,
ORDER_CREATE_TIME,
ORDER_UPDATE_TIME,
ORDER_UPDATE_USER,
SYS_ID,
SYS_NO,
PURPOSE,
CHECK_STATUS,
TUSER_NAME,
#{roomOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tuserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{venueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bookStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{validCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{orderUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{orderUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tuserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cms_room_order
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TEL = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TUSER_ID = #{tuserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENUE_ID = #{venueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROOM_ID = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOK_STATUS = #{bookStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BOOK_ID = #{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_CODE = #{validCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CREATE_TIME = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_UPDATE_TIME = #{orderUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_UPDATE_USER = #{orderUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_NO = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_user_id = #{sysUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURPOSE = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TUSER_NAME = #{tuserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROOM_ORDER_ID = #{roomOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(c.room_order_id) FROM cms_room_order c LEFT JOIN cms_team_user t on c.TUSER_ID = t.TUSER_ID LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on c.VENUE_ID = v.VENUE_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room r on c.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room_book rb on c.BOOK_ID = rb.BOOK_ID where 1=1 AND c.BOOK_STATUS in (0,1) AND NOW() < CONCAT(rb.cur_date," ",left(rb.open_period,5))
AND c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from cms_room_order WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_ORDER_ID = #{roomOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.ROOM_ORDER_ID, c.USER_ID, c.USER_NAME, c.TUSER_ID, c.ORDER_NO, c.USER_TEL, c.VALID_CODE, c.BOOK_STATUS, c.CHECK_STATUS, c.ORDER_CREATE_TIME, c.ORDER_UPDATE_TIME, t.TUSER_NAME as tuser_team_name, t.T_CREATE_TIME, rb.OPEN_PERIOD as open_period, rb.CUR_DATE as cur_date FROM cms_room_order c LEFT JOIN cms_team_user t on c.TUSER_ID = t.TUSER_ID LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on c.VENUE_ID = v.VENUE_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room r on c.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room_book rb on c.BOOK_ID = rb.BOOK_ID where 1=1 AND c.ROOM_ID = #{roomId} order by c.ORDER_CREATE_TIME desc

select ROOM_ORDER_ID,USER_ID,USER_NAME,USER_TEL,TUSER_ID,ORDER_NO,VENUE_ID,ROOM_ID, BOOK_STATUS,BOOK_ID,VALID_CODE,ORDER_CREATE_TIME,ORDER_UPDATE_TIME,ORDER_UPDATE_USER,SYS_NO,SYS_ID,PURPOSE,CHECK_STATUS, TUSER_NAME from cms_room_order where ROOM_ORDER_ID = #{roomOrderId}
SELECT COUNT(*) from cms_room_order cro where cro.ROOM_ID= #{0} and cro.BOOK_STATUS in (0,1)

SELECT c.USER_TEL, c.USER_NAME, v.VENUE_NAME as venue_name, r.ROOM_NAME as room_name, rb.OPEN_PERIOD as open_period, rb.CUR_DATE as cur_date, t.TUSER_NAME as tuser_team_name, v.VENUE_ADDRESS as venue_address, r.ROOM_NO as room_no, c.VALID_CODE FROM cms_room_order c LEFT JOIN cms_team_user t on c.TUSER_ID = t.TUSER_ID LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on c.VENUE_ID = v.VENUE_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room r on c.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room_book rb on c.BOOK_ID = rb.BOOK_ID where 1=1 AND c.BOOK_STATUS = 1 and c.ROOM_ORDER_ID = #{roomOrderId}
SELECT count(*) as statisticsCount, v.VENUE_AREA as area FROM cms_room_order c LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on c.VENUE_ID = v.VENUE_ID where 1=1 AND c.BOOK_STATUS in (1,3) GROUP by v.VENUE_AREA

select count(ro.ROOM_ORDER_ID) from cms_room_order ro inner join cms_terminal_user tu on ro.USER_ID = tu.USER_ID where 1=1 and ro.BOOK_STATUS in (0,1) and ro.ORDER_CREATE_TIME > CURDATE() and ro.ORDER_CREATE_TIME < ADDDATE(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND ro.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT c.ROOM_ORDER_ID, c.USER_ID, c.USER_NAME, c.TUSER_ID, c.ORDER_NO, c.USER_TEL, c.VALID_CODE, c.BOOK_STATUS, c.CHECK_STATUS, c.ORDER_CREATE_TIME, c.ORDER_UPDATE_TIME, t.TUSER_NAME as tuser_team_name, t.T_CREATE_TIME, rb.OPEN_PERIOD as open_period, rb.CUR_DATE as cur_date FROM cms_room_order c LEFT JOIN cms_team_user t on c.TUSER_ID = t.TUSER_ID LEFT JOIN cms_venue v on c.VENUE_ID = v.VENUE_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room r on c.ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID LEFT JOIN cms_room_book rb on c.BOOK_ID = rb.BOOK_ID where 1=1 AND c.BOOK_STATUS in (0,1) AND rb.BOOK_ID = #{bookId} order by c.ORDER_CREATE_TIME desc
